attributes.action: Ban the hoarding of vital goods
attributes.additional_details: The Chinese government, which has so far led the way in the fight against Coronavirus, have criminalised hoarding to ensure that everyone can access everyday items. The British government should follow suit.
attributes.background: All over the country, supermarket shelves are empty as people panic buy essential goods. Some even buy with the goal of exploiting a crisis, by selling on goods at exorbitant prices. Introducing price controls and banning hoarding will ensure that vulnerable people can access everyday products.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
